string-array.name: eightBall_array
string-array.item: 6 months to live
True love will find you
Riches will come your way
Your face looks like a monkeys ass
Scram ugly
You will motor boat Pamela Anderson
Donald Trump is your father
Condoleezza rice is your mom
You will steal a pot of gold
Purple Kush is your friend
Kentucky fried Chicken will give you magic powers
Snoop Dogg is your brother
Kaley Cuocco is your soul mate
Marry a Klingon
Lemme is God
Rob a Bank with a rubber chicken
katy Perry is waiting for you at home
The A Team comes when you call
Britney spears is your love slave
Start a Cult called Programmers anonymous
